application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description:
T1	False Acacia x 1 (Robinia pseudoacacia) Remove substantial dead wood
T2	Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus) improve light and reduce sail effect and root expansion.
Suggested works- Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 5-6m leaving shortened furnishing growth
T3	Sycamore x 1 (Acer pseudoplatanus)	Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 5-6m leaving shortened furnishing growth
T4	Acer spp x 1	. To shape and contain. Reduce all round by approx. 2m to suitable new growth points leaving shortened furnishing growth
T5	False Acacia x 1 (Robinia pseudoacacia)  Remove the largest re-growth on front left hand side pollard point
T6	Sycamore x 1	(Acer pseudoplatanus)  Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 2-3m leaving shortened furnishing growth
T7	Sycamore x 1	(Acer pseudoplatanus) - Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 2-3m leaving shortened furnishing growth
T8	Bay x 1 (Laurus nobilis) Suggested works- Trim all round 

Front garden
T10	Holly x 1(Ilex aquifolium)  Reduce height approx. 3m- Trim all round
Front garden
T11	Dogwood x 1 (Cornus Spp)	To shape and contain. Suggested work...
